name: Angle Soccer
description:
Angle Soccer is a soccer-themed physics puzzle game. The player must think to solve the puzzles, but in a comical and creative way.



Features

  • Select which ball to attack with
  • Face different types of opponents
  • Deal with physics
  • Solve the puzzles
  • Score a goal

    The game mechanics are simple: using just the mouse, drag the protagonist to some angle, pointing to where you want to kick the ball.
